description: This file contains database interaction functions for managing users and notes, including creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes, as well as user authentication processes using SQLAlchemy ORM.

methods.name: Optional[models.User] get_user_by_username(db: Session, username: str)
methods.description: Retrieve a user from the database matching the given username.

methods.name: models.User create_user(db: Session, user: schemas.UserCreate)
methods.description: Create a new user with hashed password and store in database.

methods.name: verify_password(plain_password, hashed_password)
methods.description: Check if the plaintext password matches the hashed password.

methods.name: authenticate_user(db: Session, username: str, password: str)
methods.description: Authenticate a user using username and password.

methods.name: get_notes(db: Session, user_id: int)
methods.description: Get all notes belonging to a specific user.

methods.name: get_note(db: Session, note_id: int, user_id: int)
methods.description: Fetch a specific note owned by a user.

methods.name: create_note(db: Session, note: schemas.NoteCreate, user_id: int)
methods.description: Create and save a new note for a user.

methods.name: update_note(db: Session, note_id: int, note: schemas.NoteUpdate, user_id: int)
methods.description: Update contents of an existing note.

methods.name: delete_note(db: Session, note_id: int, user_id: int)
methods.description: Remove a note from the database.

ctags.name: authenticate_user
ctags.pattern: /^def authenticate_user(db: Session, username: str, password: str):$/

ctags.name: create_note
ctags.pattern: /^def create_note(db: Session, note: schemas.NoteCreate, user_id: int):$/

ctags.name: delete_note
ctags.pattern: /^def delete_note(db: Session, note_id: int, user_id: int):$/

ctags.name: get_note
ctags.pattern: /^def get_note(db: Session, note_id: int, user_id: int):$/

ctags.name: update_note
ctags.pattern: /^def update_note(db: Session, note_id: int, note: schemas.NoteUpdate, user_id: int):$/
ctags.signature: (db: Session, note_id: int, note: schemas.NoteUpdate, user_id: int)
